ComicInfo.Series: Here Come the Lovejoys Father Fixation
ComicInfo.Summary: Some folks only pay lip service to family values. The Lovejoys, however, service every possible body part! In this brand new miniseries, Frank and Mildred's lovely daughter Debbie turns 18! The entire Lovejoy clan reunites to celebrate, including Frank's estranged stepdaughter Jenny and her husband Lloyd. Unfortunately, things turn sour when Jenny catches Lloyd and Debbie celebrating without their clothes on. Jenny decides to leave Lloyd, and make some changes in her life - which include finding her real father. The search will be costly, but stepdad Frank is willing to help...for a rather 'inappropriate' favor!
